summary: This is an email from a Supervisory Staff Attorney at the New York Metropolitan Correctional Center, sent on August 10, 2019, requesting a mailing address for Jeffrey Epstein's next of kin (brother) and attaching a draft condolence letter. The document indicates official communication following Epstein's death in custody.

persons.name: Supervisory Staff Attorney CLC
persons.context: Author of the email requesting a mailing address for Epstein's next of kin and attaching a draft condolence letter.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the condolence letter; his death is the reason for the correspondence.

events.title: Request for Epstein Next of Kin Address
events.description: A Supervisory Staff Attorney at the New York Metropolitan Correctional Center emails to request a mailing address for Jeffrey Epstein's next of kin (brother) and attaches a draft condolence letter.

locations: New York Metropolitan Correctional Center, 150 Park Row, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: The email is dated August 10, 2019, shortly after Jeffrey Epstein's death in custody on August 9-10, 2019.
It is a request for the mailing address of Epstein's next of kin, specifically his brother, to send a condolence letter.
The correspondence originates from the New York Metropolitan Correctional Center, where Epstein was held.
The document is marked 'CONFIDENTIAL' and is part of the SDNY (Southern District of New York) case files.
